Title: Dark Places
Writer: Gilles Paquet-Brenner (written for the screen by), Gillian Flynn (novel)
Actors: Charlize Theron, Sterling Jerins, Nicholas Hoult, Christina Hendricks
Plot: Libby Day was only eight years old when her family was brutally murdered in their rural Kansas farmhouse. Almost thirty years later, she reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime and uncovers the wrenching truths that led up to that tragic night.
Production: Cuatro Plus Films, Exclusive Media Group, Denver and Delilah Productions, Mandalay Pictures
